|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F8:7B:8C |oui = F8:7B:8C

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192CE; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "LPCY0007 V1.6" and a date code of '''1337''' is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :RTL8197D is the SoC used.. RTL8812AR is assumed to be used.. and RTL8192CE is probably the 2.4GHz radio.
Per '''Amped Wireless'''' press release and product page... *The device has one dual-band antenna and one dedicated antenna for each of the two bands. *This device uses four 5GHz 700mW 2-Stage amplifiers, two 2.4GHz amplifiers, and four ''advanced'' LNAs. *The processor clock speed is 660MHz.
The FCC ID and IC IDs are presumed to be ZTT-RTA15 and 10233A-RTA15, respectively.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.ampedwireless.com/press/article.html?id=70 Press release]
==Reviews== *[http://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/5887/amped-wireless-rta15-high-power-dual-band-802-11ac-router-review/index2.html On '''TweakTown'''] :An annotated board shot is available in this review. The used OUI, WLAN Amplifier, WI2, and the switch P/Ns are per this review.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
